document_data.name: Chaver Tegarech
document_data.mainbody: '''Chaver Tegarech''' was an aide to First Speaker [[Tessarin Alaurun]] in [[Nesmé]]. In [[1374 DR]] he rode from Nesmé to check upon a watchpost at [[Morach Tor]]{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|19}} and was kidnapped by the [[Khoroshen]] tribe of [[lizardfolk]],{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|18}} who had been hired to protect the town against attack from [[giant]]s and [[troll]]s.{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|17-18}} The lizardfolk betrayed Alaurun and Nesmé. Tegarech overheard a conversation between the lizardfolk and the trolls, to decide upon how to split Nesmé and its surrounding lands, and was captured.{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|22}}
